response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe holds immense value for you based on your needs and preferences. After careful consideration of its worth and your anticipated benefit, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to maximize your satisfaction while ensuring a fair return for us. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this proposal.", "product_price": 950000}
